description: 19 year-old Lucky Adams is home alone again on a dark, stormy night when the power suddenly goes out. As he searches for the breaker box, solitary candle in hand, he's followed by a shadowy creature... could it be the ghost of Corey Stevens? Lucky doesn't find the breaker box by the time he reaches the upstairs bedroom, which is where he runs face to face into the ghost! And this ghost is horny! Corey mesmerizes Lucky into shedding his clothes, and then takes Corey's delicious boycock deep into his mouth, sucking for all he's worth, as if in a trance. The two teens get onto the bed, and engage in some hot 69-action, before the ghost flips Lucky over on his back, legs up, and fucks him hard. Both boys produce nice creamy loads of boycum.
title: CitiBoyz 10: Getting Lucky, Scene #04
